author: Fox News
title: Russian ground forces near Kyiv, explosion devastates Ukrainian capital: LIVE UPDATES
description: It's war: Russia launched a three-pronged invasion of Ukraine, targeting the capital city of Kyiv, attacking the second-largest city Kharkov, and bringing in troops from Crimea. Ukrainians are fighting back but Russia has gained ground.
content:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy took aim at NATO powers early Friday morning, accusing them of "watching from afar" as Russia continues its invasion of Ukraine.
